classes.name: Warrior
classes.description: A strong and resilient fighter, born in the heat of battle. Warriors are skilled in melee combat and can take a lot of damage.

classes.name: Mage
classes.description: A master of the arcane arts, Mages wield powerful spells to deal damage and control the battlefield. They are fragile but can deal massive damage.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: A stealthy and agile fighter, Rogues excel in quick strikes and evasion. They can deal high damage but are vulnerable in direct combat.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A holy warrior who uses divine magic to heal and protect allies. Clerics are versatile and can also deal damage.
